title: Vector Space Examples Gallery
description: Interactive gallery showcasing six diverse vector space examples with visual representations, zero vectors, and operation examples.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Linear Algebra
Vector Spaces
Mathematical Structures

learningObjectives: Recognize diverse examples of vector spaces beyond R^n
Identify the zero vector and its role in each vector space
Distinguish finite dimensional from infinite dimensional spaces
Understand vector addition and scalar multiplication in different contexts

controls.name: Card hover
controls.description: Hover over cards to see vector addition and scalar multiplication examples

controls.description: Click to highlight a card for discussion
